title: Gingerbread Spiced Pancakes
ingredients: ['375g plain flour', '6 tablespoons baking powder', '3 teaspoons unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground ginger', '3/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '3/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '6 tablespoons ground hazelnuts', '750ml milk', '6 egg whites', '6 tablespoons black treacle', '6 tablespoons vegetable oil']
